aboutEros.title: About Eros Unlimited
aboutEros.text: The God Eros in Greek mythology is often related to Love and Beauty, but the truth is Eros was also mundane. His favorite hobby was descending to Earth with one goal in mind, exploring Human sexuality. Eros Unlimited Production desires to enlighten the World of forbidden pleasures, taboos, ambiguous non-conformist genders and sexuality with a different eye, an unique angle. We hope You enjoy Eros and let him hit you with his arrow of Love.

about.title: About Us
about.heroQuote: A dream come true, an amazing challenge that comes to life to enlighten the lives of people, places and situations that often don't make it to the main screen.
about.missionText1: Our main objective is to create art in form of films depicting unique characters and themes to satiate an increasing desire of the
about.missionText2: and all independent movies lovers audience.
about.missionText3: The movies featured on this platform are only able to exist due to the passion, care, love and collective effort of independent artists, actors, producers, dear friends and family who share a deep desire of making our planet a
about.missionText4: better, equal and freer place for all peoples.
about.visionText1: In the arms of Eros Unlimited there is no limit for the imagination, there is no prejudice and also no boundaries, in here
about.visionText2: ALL genders are embraced and welcome.
about.visionText3: So open your heart, let the God Eros show you the way to a new era of forbidden pleasures, hidden mysteries of human sexuality and different kinds of fairy tale love.
about.bornIn: Born in 1979, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
about.bioText: Worked as a television reporter in 2009; 'A Demitida' Theatre Play director and produced 'O travesseiro', 'João por um Fio' and 'Dispare' in 2010; 'Nos bailes da Vida' Documentary Scriptwriter and director's assistant in 2011 and 2012. Executive Producer and Director of 'Eros Unlimited Production' since 2010.
about.joinJourneyText: Be part of a movement that celebrates diversity, love, and artistic freedom. Discover stories that matter, characters that inspire, and films that change perspectives.
about.exploringThemes: Exploring themes of prejudice and acceptance

home.subtitle: Discover and watch the best movies

partner.title: Become Our Partner
partner.subtitle: Join us and expand your reach
partner.heroText: Join our vision of creating a dream place where independent artists can expose their creativity, share their films and succeed faster than an arrow crossing a heart.
partner.visionText3: who are willing to share their amazing LGBTQ+ themed films and be able to sell them online with our on demand platform.
partner.visionText5: daring, sexy, underground, innovative, sensual, experimental, uniquely bizarre, ambiguous, androgynous
partner.visionText6: film that depicts the lives of interesting and unconventional characters - we want to hear from you!
partner.filmMattersText1: You can sell it, rent it and create your own audience as anything can happen if you believe in our art.
partner.filmMattersText3: So don't be shy and give it a try. Eros on demand has a vision, and your new movie can be part of this dream.
partner.creativeFreedomDesc: Express your artistic vision without limitations or censorship
partner.globalAudienceDesc: Reach LGBTQ+ communities and indie film lovers worldwide
partner.festivalNetworkDesc: Access to our established network of international film festivals
partner.passionateCommunityDesc: Connect with artists who share your vision for inclusive storytelling
partner.joinCommunityText: Join our community of creative partners and see your vision come to life
partner.readyToStartText: Send us your film details, portfolio, or just a message about your project. We're excited to learn about your creative vision and explore how we can work together.

partner.readyToChangeWorld: Ready to Change the World Through Film?
partner.readyToChangeWorldText: Join us in creating a more inclusive, diverse, and beautiful world through the power of independent cinema.
